biography_text: MARSHALL, Roger Wayne, a Representative from Kansas; born in El Dorado, Butler County, Kans., August 9, 1960; graduated from El Dorado High School, El Dorado, Kans., 1978; A.S., Butler Community College, El Dorado, Kans., 1980; B.S., Kansas State University, Manhattan, Kan; M.D. University of Kansas School of Medicine, Kansas City, Kans, 1987; United States Army Reserves, 1984-1991; physician; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Fifteenth Congress (January 3, 2017-present).
